dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset contains real image data collected in urban, rural, and highway scenes, with up to 15 cars and 30 pedestrians in each image, along with various degrees of occlusion and truncation.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: G. Pandey
J. R. McBride
R. M. Eustice
dcterms:description: The Ford Campus Vision and LiDAR dataset is collected from an autonomous ground vehicle testing platform. The vehicle trajectory paths in these datasets contain several large and small-scale loops.
dcterms:title: Ford Campus

dcterms:creator: N. Carlevaris-Bianco
A. K. Ushani
R. M. Eustice
dcterms:description: The NCLT dataset was collected at the University of Michigan, where the dataset repeatedly explores the campus, both indoors and outdoors, on varying trajectories and at different times of the day across all four seasons.
dcterms:title: NCLT
